list.name: Default
list.comment: Fixed Bug #1 Trying to fix horizontal instellingen view

task.summary: Trying to get a date system to work and more work on timetables
Initial Maven setup in preparation for Travis CI. Done some work on RoosterHandler to prevent NullPointerExceptions.
More work on Timed Notifications and the Timetables
Changed compiler to rely on the ANDROID_HOME user variable
Fixed the bug where initial alarms would be skipped. Dirty fix, using setAction. Thanks to Theo for that! :) Also, fixed another bug where notifications wouldn't disappear when clicked.
Merged Release Branche. Ready for first release, don't be scared if you come across a bug.
Fixed a bug with the landscape view
Fixed Bug #1 Trying to fix horizontal instellingen view

MESSAGE.value: Trying to get a date system to work and more work on timetables
Initial Maven setup in preparation for Travis CI. Done some work on RoosterHandler to prevent NullPointerExceptions.
More work on Timed Notifications and the Timetables
Changed compiler to rely on the ANDROID_HOME user variable
Fixed the bug where initial alarms would be skipped. Dirty fix, using setAction. Thanks to Theo for that! :) Also, fixed another bug where notifications wouldn't disappear when clicked.
Fixing Bugs and doing some pre-release cleanup.
Merged Release Branche. Ready for first release, don't be scared if you come across a bug.
Fixed a bug with the landscape view
Fixed Bug #1 Trying to fix horizontal instellingen view
